data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Irbid to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Irbid, Jordan
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 2,506 believers in Irbid, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 375 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, make the 2,506 believers in Irbid to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 939,594 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 920,648, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Arab, Jordanian people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Irbid, Jordan today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 942,100 citizens of Irbid, Jordan, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 2,506 believers in Irbid to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.
